title: Firefox Monitor
content: I recently accessed Firefox Monitor. Living in Australia we had a large Data Breach from Optus (Phone carrier) in Sept last year. Yet it was not litsed in your list. Please advise
creator: pcostello3

title: Bookmarks Sidebar Freezes
content: The Bookmarks Sidebar freezes at times. When I close it and get it back, it works okay for a while. It happens infrequently but I lose my place and have to navigate back which is inconvenient. Please fix. This is the second time I have tried to report this, the first time the page got refreshed some how so I had to start all over again.
creator: WCarp7

title: Vertical Line Distortion
content:
When I pull up music form CCLI Song Select, the staff lines on the music are missing and distorted.

I do not have this problem with Google Chrome. I disabled the Hardware Acceleration and still have the issue.

I prefer Firefox browser ... but if this is going to continue, I may need to go back to Google Chrome as my default browser.

Thank You,
creator: fkhumber
